text: Thank you both. I found that cachebusting sometimes resolves the issue, but it wasn’t really reliable.

<@U7SL518D6> I resolved the issue by updating the page content and template file vigorously until it started working again, but I’m not sure it’s a long term-solution.
I’ve had the problem on pages <https://www.globalwebindex.com/reports> and <https://www.globalwebindex.com/case-studies>
I can’t really reproduce the issue anymore, but the gist of it is that the Query variable didn’t include arguments passed from the URL.
